title: Artifacts bucket lacks encryption configuration, potentially exposing sensitive build artifacts
stealth_technique: Bucket appears internal-only so encryption might seem optional to developers

title: Build agent security group allows unrestricted inbound access from any IP
stealth_technique: Justified as temporary for testing but often left in place

title: Pipeline role has overly broad permissions across multiple critical services
stealth_technique: Permissions added incrementally as pipeline needs arise, masking the cumulative excess

title: No access logging configured for pipeline artifacts bucket
stealth_technique: Logging omitted as seemingly unnecessary for build artifacts

title: Cross-account role trust lacks ExternalId condition, increasing vulnerability to confused deputy attacks
stealth_technique: Basic cross-account access works without ExternalId, making the security improvement non-obvious
